  • Method Details

    • calculateFee

      public org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<FeeResponse> calculateFee(Optional<String> city, Optional<String> vehicle, Optional<LocalDateTime> dateTime) throws org.apache.coyote.BadRequestException
      Calculates the fee for a given city, vehicle type, and optional date and time.
      Parameters:
      city - (Optional) The name of the city for which to calculate the fee.
      vehicle - (Optional) The type of vehicle for which to calculate the fee.
      dateTime - (Optional) The date and time for which to calculate the fee.
      Returns:
      An EntityModel containing the calculated fee response, with a self-referencing link.
      Throws:
      org.apache.coyote.BadRequestException - if the provided parameters are invalid or if the calculation fails.

    • calculateTotalFee

      public float calculateTotalFee(Optional<String> city, Optional<String> vehicle) throws org.apache.coyote.BadRequestException
      Calculates the total fee based on the optional parameters for city and vehicle.
      Parameters:
      city - An optional parameter representing the city for which the fee is calculated.
      vehicle - An optional parameter representing the vehicle type for which the fee is calculated.
      Returns:
      The calculated total fee.
      Throws:
      org.apache.coyote.BadRequestException - if there is a problem with the request parameters.

    • calculateTotalFee

      public float calculateTotalFee(Optional<String> optCity, Optional<String> optVehicle, Optional<LocalDateTime> dateTime) throws org.apache.coyote.BadRequestException, VehicleForbiddenException
      Calculates the total fee based on the optional parameters for city, vehicle, and date/time.
      Parameters:
      optCity - An optional parameter representing the city for which the fee is calculated.
      optVehicle - An optional parameter representing the vehicle type for which the fee is calculated.
      dateTime - An optional parameter representing the date and time for which weather data will be taken. If dateTime is empty, the latest weather data will be taken.
      Returns:
      The calculated total fee.
      Throws:
      org.apache.coyote.BadRequestException - if there is a problem with the request parameters, such as missing or invalid data.
      VehicleForbiddenException - if the specified vehicle is not allowed according to the weather data.
      ExtraWeatherConditionsNotFoundException - if one of weather conditions are not found.
      RegionalBaseFeeNotFoundException - if no RegionalBaseFee is found for the specified city.

    • calculateRegionalBaseFee

      public float calculateRegionalBaseFee(String city, String vehicle)

    • calculateExtraFee

      public float calculateExtraFee(String vehicle, WeatherData weatherData)
